channel.title: Showcase
channel.description: Show off your latest creation here -- no shame involved!

item.title: CTF-Lucius-EBTC [UT99|5 pics]
item.author: invalid@example.com (EBTC)
item.dc:creator: EBTC
item.content:encoded:
a normal grav powertrack edition of the regular Lucius.

Eddie Bouncer: Basically i hated that low-grav pit, so as a personal miniproject i added the jumppads to pick up the pace in the pit, now with normal gravity. After that Teasy jumped in to bunnify the place and it basically came to a turn-based-editing-frenzy upto this EBTC edition. Included:
- jumppads, hammerjumps, liftjumps and dodges
- added some gaps/holes/construction beams for alternate escapes/route-switching
- improved...

CTF-Lucius-EBTC [UT99|5 pics]

For UT2004

item.title: DM-ParadiseCity
item.author: invalid@example.com (FTPlus)
item.dc:creator: FTPlus
item.content:encoded:
I posted this map only a few days before the big breakdown of NC and only had a few reaction because of this. Well, lets give it another shot.

It is mainly a outdoors map featuring a futuristic city with large building. Altough it might look vast, the action is actually quite compressed. I really like to hear your comments, beause I think it is my best map so far.

Code:
    ________________________________________________________________________
   /...
DM-ParadiseCity

item.title: First map for UT99

item.dc:creator: Ein
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys
I started mapping a while ago, and now I'm back to mapping, and this here is my first map (albeit not very finished...)

Sorry about the rapidshare file, I couldn't find a good place in it to take a picture.

Should I keep mapping or should I stop before I do too much damage?

Thanks in advance!

EDIT: Right, sorry.
It's a few steps up from DM-XxSubtractedCubeOfDeath][, it contains two large rooms, one...

First map for UT99

item.title: DM-Cordon
item.author: invalid@example.com (Twrecks)
item.dc:creator: Twrecks
item.content:encoded:
Okay, I posted it on the main page because I was like really glad to actually had finished this map to a working state. I've been experimenting with Unreal tech through this map for some time as you can see the UT99 version roots in one of the pics below. I wasn't going for pretty, just playable. Because of the funky off-the-grid architecture the BSP version met death and has been erased from my HD, could only get the exterior to rebuild, any interior work resulted in major BSP holes and out...

DM-Cordon

item.title: DM-Vileville (WIP)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Patrick_H)
item.dc:creator: Patrick_H
item.content:encoded:
This is my current project, Vileville.
An old fashioned town that's eerily deserted...something is very wrong here in Vileville. The architecture is inspired by the many turn-of-the-century brick buildings in my area. Its 99% custom textures and meshes. Its got a ways to go though- I'll be adding a horror-themed sewer system beneath the streets, and there will be access to the rooftops. Between those additions players will enjoy some vertical gameplay in the level design....

DM-Vileville (WIP)

item.title: CTF-Dreko-V2 (UT99)
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTi)
item.dc:creator: GTi
item.content:encoded:
My newest release after almost a year without any unrealed practice lol

Here i leave you 2 .RAR files. One has the .UNR, a .UZ and a .TXT file, the other has 4 textures that you might need and that are explained in the .TXT

Hope you like it, and please bring back the nalicity site!

http://rapidshare.com/files/141804434/CTF-Dreko-V2.rar.html 2.66MB

http://rapidshare.com/files/141801054/CTF-Dreko-V2-Textures.rar.html 17.2MB

Sorry about the dark pics,...

CTF-Dreko-V2 (UT99)

item.title: DM-Morpheus UT3
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sphyncter)
item.dc:creator: Sphyncter
item.content:encoded:
Heya guys
this is my first ut map that ive made out of all of the series
its a remake of the UT99 Morpheus level
i tried to make it as similar to the original as possible
but have added a couple of extras aswel
there are few minor bugs, but nothing that will lower the gameplay of the level
so i hope every likes it



you can download it from...

DM-Morpheus UT3

item.title: Dm DarkStone-Keep for Unreal Tournament
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dugz Maps)
item.dc:creator: Dugz Maps
item.content:encoded:
This is a map that I did a long while back and have since revisited to rework some areas of map flow and game play plus a slight change in atmosphere and additional detail.
http://www.adam.com.au/dougjodie/DmDarkStone-Keep-UT.zip
Thanks to the guys at Old Unreal for there input realizing the the maps full potential.
It is a castle type map on a number of vertical levels giving an always interesting 3D approach to combat....

Dm DarkStone-Keep for Unreal Tournament

item.title: ONS-Agamendon[Monsters]
item.author: invalid@example.com (cosmix)
item.dc:creator: cosmix
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I want to introduce a map I had build on for overall a year.
On this map I tried out a lot new stuff. It's an Onslaught battle but there is no terrain e.g.
Further I worked with some interesting technics like physics, new vehicles and monsters and embedded them into the map.
At last there is only one single file needed to play the map.


[SCREENSHOT]http://www.alice-dsl.net/thorsten.hamann/AgamendonMonsters/Draufsicht.jpg[/SCREENSHOT]

Top view of the map (click to enlarge)....

ONS-Agamendon[Monsters]

item.title: ONS-WarLords
item.author: invalid@example.com (cosmix)
item.dc:creator: cosmix
item.content:encoded:
Me is cosmix and this is the map i worked for the last year.
There are several new static meshes and some new textures in there.
The nodes are placed symetric but i try somethink new in the tower at the center.
Two nodes are in there, one down~ and the other upstairs.
They are connected and you can reach each other with stairs outside or a lift i placed through the inside of the tower .
Maybe the team with the bottom node has a little advantage but on the other case this team has the...

ONS-WarLords
